summary: Implement stable actor pattern and standardized React Query caching/cleanup across all admin pages' GET API hooks (front-end only), while preserving existing Spanish UI/error messages and not modifying the :root CSS variables block in index.css.
architectural_notes: All admin GET data-fetching hooks must stabilize actor via useState/useEffect and only enable queries when stableActor is available and actor is not fetching.
Standard React Query config for admin GET queries: staleTime=5min, gcTime=30min, refetchOnMount=false, refetchOnWindowFocus=false, retry=1, enabled=Boolean(stableActor)&&!actorFetching.
Each admin page component must clear related React Query caches on unmount using queryClient.removeQueries with page-specific queryKey prefixes.
Preserve existing Spanish interface and error messages when updating hooks.
Do not remove/modify/overwrite the :root CSS custom properties block in index.css; only append new CSS below it if needed. კონკრეტ variable names/values/structure must remain unchanged.

existing_features.title: Update all admin-page GET data-fetching React Query hooks to use the stable-actor pattern (stabilize the actor reference via `useState` + `useEffect` and only run queries once the stable actor exists), to prevent duplicate API calls caused by actor reference changes.
Apply the standardized React Query cache configuration to every admin-page GET query (including products, categories, on-sale items, store details, export/statistics, and user management listings).

Implement stable-actor + standardized query configuration specifically for the admin Products page GET queries (ensuring all product-related GET hooks used by the Products admin UI follow the same pattern and config).

Implement stable-actor + standardized query configuration for the admin Categories page GET queries (including `useGetAllCategories()` and any other category GET hooks used by the Categories admin UI).

Implement stable-actor + standardized query configuration for the admin On-Sale Products page GET queries (sale items pagination/listing and any product-search GET hooks used for sale item creation/editing).
Implement stable-actor + standardized query configuration for the admin Store Details page GET queries (store details fetch for each store).
Implement stable-actor + standardized query configuration for the admin Export page GET queries (export statistics and any other export-related GET queries).
Implement stable-actor + standardized query configuration for the admin User Management page GET queries (e.g., listing users/roles).
Add React Query cache cleanup on unmount for each admin page component by removing queries using the specified query-key prefixes (exact: false), so returning to the page results in a fresh load.

Preserve existing Spanish UI and error messages while implementing the stable-actor pattern, standardized React Query config, and unmount cache cleanup (do not translate or replace Spanish strings already present in the UI/toasts).

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply stable actor pattern + standardized React Query config and unmount cache cleanup for all admin pages' GET API hooks (Products, Categories, On-Sale Products, Store Details, Export, User Management).
